column5: (StepDescription: Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk but spill)']

column5: (StepDescription: Add-Add 2 pieces of chocolate to the mug)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Add-Add 1 piece of chocolate to the mug)']

column5: (StepDescription: Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug)']

column5: (StepDescription: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of white sugar to the mug)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of salt to the mug)']

column5: (StepDescription: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 1 minute)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 2 minutes)']

column7: (StepDescription: Heat-Heat the contents of the mug for 1 minute and serve)
column8: (StepModifiedDescription: Heat-Heat the contents of the mug for 61 seconds and serve)']
